channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 03:48 Drive alarm to the Kiev region. Stop by further messages.
item.description: 游릭 03:48 Drive alarm to the Kiev region. Stop by further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 02:50 pm alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-miravskaya territorial community-Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 02:50 pm alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-miravskaya territorial community-Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
